attributes.action: Pass a Law which Forces ALL spenders of Taxpayers money to declare ALL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spending (Expenses or anything else)down to the last penny.
This to be registered on a website immediately the claim is made, anyone found of abusing the system to be IMMEDIATELY removed from office and MP's not allowed to "stand down at the next election" and to recieve a lifetime ban on holding publis office and the name passed to Police for possible prosecution.

rejection.details:
There is an existing petition on the declaration of all public spending online:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/PublishFinances/

Your requests for MPs to be removed and prosecuted are outside the remit/powers of the PM/Government.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
